mapper.select: select u.User_no, u.NameHan, substring(u.StudResNum,1,6) StudResNum, (case u.Gender when 1 then '남' when 2 then '여' end) Gender from Users u, ApplyInfo a where a.User_no=u.User_no and a.Curriculum_no=#{curriNo} and a.State='비트생'
select Project_no, ProjectName from Project where Curriculum_no=#{curriculum_no}
select u.NameHan from ProjectMember pm, Users u where pm.User_no=u.User_no and Project_no=#{project_no}
